00016 function fget($url) {
00020   $curl = curl_init($url);
00021 
00022   curl_setopt_array($curl, array(
00023     CURLOPT_REFERER => $_ENV['SCRIPT_URI'],
00024     CURLOPT_FAILONERROR => TRUE,
00025     CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => 1,
00026     CURLOPT_CLOSEPOLICY => CURLCLOSEPOLICY_LEAST_RECENTLY_USED,
00027   ));
00028 
00032   $file = curl_exec($curl);
00033   curl_close($curl);
00034 
00035   return $file;
00036 }
